name: chartbrew
description: Chartbrew is a self-hosted platform for creating live dashboards and charts from databases and APIs. It allows scheduling syncs, building templates, team collaboration, and embedding visualizations anywhere via web UI.
features: Live Dashboards: Create real-time dashboards from databases and APIs. Dynamic visualization.
Data Connections: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and APIs. Universal integration.
Scheduled Syncs: Automatic data updates at custom intervals. Always current.
Chart Templates: Pre-built templates for common visualizations. Quick setup.
Team Collaboration: Share dashboards with team members. Collaborative analytics.
Embeddable: Embed charts anywhere with iframe support. Flexible sharing.
Self-Hosted: Keep your analytics data private. Complete control.
